lcInstruction.p: The following reusable components/types of reuse are available in DITA:

ul.li:
Topic (maps and topics)
Using the same topic in multiple maps (for example, a topic with boilerplate safety information might be included at the beginning of each manual) - reused at the map level
Using the same map in multiple maps (for example, a map for a document about a product line might appear in the documentation for each product in that line)

Fragment (conref)
Single element (and its contents)
Simple pull
Conrefend
Conref a series of elements
First and last must be the same type
Conrefpush
Push element into another topic
Before, after, or in place of
Map-based
Works with conkeyref
Does not work with conrefend

Variable (key)
Inline content
Filenames
Images
Cross-references
External references
Conrefs (conkeyref)
Naming keys (particularly for images)
